attributes.action: nationalise the Bank of England and assume control of the British Currency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The sum of debt-free money in circulation has declined to a few percent of the total. 

Most of our money is a result of loans issued by private multinational banks. The increase in debt-money is not sustainable because debt comes attached with compound interest: to pay the interest requires ever more loans.

This situation could lead to the destabilization of our civilization.

The proposed solution would help restore economic sanity and reduce the suffering of the people.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
